chart.title: Aquaculture production
chart.subtitle: Aquaculture is the farming of aquatic organisms including fish, molluscs, crustaceans and aquatic plants. Aquaculture production specifically refers to output from aquaculture activities, which are designated for final harvest for consumption.
chart.citation: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), via World Bank (2025)
